pros: Has great burst ability with Throwing Star Barrage
Has attack that increases %EXP and %Item Drop Rate with Showdown
Uses Throwing Stars and has Throwing Stars flying everywhere with Assassin's Mark
Dark Sight allows you to dodge certain attacks while bossing
cons: Lacks survivability and has Low HP
Most of damage comes from burst-type skills
Throwing Stars which must be recharged at NPC Shop

baseStats: Excludes attack specfic bonuses, Hyper Skill passives, Frailty Curse debuff, Showdown - Enhance, Link Skills, and buffs with cooldowns

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Thief to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the quest 'Victoria Island or Bust' and choose the 'Thief, speedy and sneaky' option

Once you reach Lv. 30 as a Thief, talk to Dark Lord to accept a quest called 'Path of the Assassin'. Completing the quest will make you an Assassin and you will be on the path to a Night Lord. Assassin is the 2nd job of Night Lord

build: -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Showdown - Reinforce and Enhance
  • Quad Star - Reinforce, Boss Rush, and Extra Strike

extraContent.title: Dark Sight
extraContent.content:
Referenced from Nox and Fatalyz

Dark Sight can only ignore falling debris such as from bosses like Magnus meteors, Pierre hats, Vellum rocks, Papulatus falling clocks, and Lotus demolishers. There are several %Max HP attacks that can be ignored, for example, Magnus spin attack, Crimson Queen's DoT flame, and Damien falling yellow/red meteors

Other attacks that can be avoided include, Gollux reverse key bomb (debuff still applies but no damage or stun is taken) and Magnus stun smoke Most non-debris one-shots cannot be avoided. For example, Vellum's tail attack and head pop, Von Bon's orb projectile and Crimson Queen's flame breath

All direct endgame boss attacks such as Lotus, Damien, Lucid and Will are unavoidable

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Double Stab
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 165%
primary.desc: Stabs a single enemy twice

primary.name: Lucky Seven
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 190%
primary.desc: Throws 2 throwing stars at a single enemy

primary.name: Haste
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Duration: 200 sec, Speed: +40, Jump: +20\n[Passive Effects - Max Speed: +20]

primary.name: Dark Sight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, hides in the shadows for 200 seconds.\nWhen Dark Sight is deactivated, cooldown increased per attack dodged: 3 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.
primary.desc: While active, you cannot hit or be hit by enemies
details: Has a cooldown (3 secs, stacks up to 5 times) per attack dodged
You can use Flash Jump while in Dark Sight

primary.name: Flash Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, jumps further, able to use 2 times consecutively.
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
Can be used twice in a row

primary.name: Nimble Body
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 20

primary.name: Shuriken Burst
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 18 and 2 throwing stars, Damage: 410%, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Throws a shuriken forward that explodes damaging nearby enemies

primary.name: Assassin's Mark
primary.shortDesc: Grants a 40% chance to leave a mark on attack. Attacking again will produce 2 Throwing Stars to deal 30% + 1% damage of player's level.
primary.desc: While toggled, your attacks have a chance to create homing throwing stars that attack nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Gust Charm
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21 and 2 throwing stars, Damage: 285%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Knockback Range: 350
primary.desc: Creates a gust of wind that pushes enemies back

primary.name: Claw Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Claw Attack Speed increased for 200 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Claw Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Claw Mastery: +50%, Throwing Stars: +200
details: Additionally increases the max number of charges each Throwing Star slot can hold

primary.name: Critical Throw
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +50%, Critical Damage: +5%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 30 and DEX by 30

primary.name: Triple Throw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 290%, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Throws 3 throwing stars at a single enemy

primary.name: Shade Splitter
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30 and 3 throwing stars, Damage: 213%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Hurls a barrage of throwing stars in front of you

primary.name: Dark Flare
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Inflicts 280% damage over its duration, Reflects 1300% damage dealt by nearby enemies, Cooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Creates a damaging field that also reflects damage back taken within the field
details: Cannot reflect more than half of the enemy's Max HP
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Shadow Web
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Duration: 3 sec, Bind Chance: 80%, Damage: 150%, Damage Over Time: 100% per sec
primary.desc: Throws a web that debuffs enemies while launching you upward
details:
[Debuff]: Enemy cannot move and are periodically damaged
  • Does not affect bosses
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Shadow Partner
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 64, summons a shadow that makes an additional hit that is 70% of the final damage for all attacks for 200 sec
primary.desc: Creates a clone that mimics your attacks, increasing the number of hits you deal per attack
details: The clone's attack deals reduced %Final Damage
Does not mimic summoning skills and 5th Job Common Skills

primary.name: Shadow Stars
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16 and 100 throwing stars, Duration: 200 sec
primary.desc: Allows you to use your skills without consuming any Throwing Stars

primary.name: Enveloping Darkness
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%

primary.name: Venom
primary.shortDesc: Status Chance: 30%, Damage Over Time: 90% damage every 1 sec for 6 sec
primary.desc: Your attacks have a chance to apply a damaging poison debuff

primary.name: Expert Throwing Star Handling
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +25%, Recharge Chance: 20%
details:
Grants a chance for your attacks to cost no Throwing Star or MP and instead recharges 1 Throwing Star
  • When the passive activates, your next attack will always be a Critical Hit

primary.name: Alchemic Adrenaline
primary.shortDesc: Recovery Amount: +170%, Critical Damage: +10%

primary.name: Quad Star
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 26, Damage: 420%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Throws 4 throwing stars at a single enemy

primary.name: Showdown
primary.shortDesc: MP 40, Stars Consumed: 3.\nProvoke up to 6 enemies with 618% damage, attacking 2 times. The provoked enemy becomes untouchable. For 120 sec, the acquired EXP and Item Drop Rate increases by 5%. Effect halved for bosses.
primary.desc: Throws a giant exploding dagger forward that debuffs enemies
details:
[Debuff]: Increases %EXP and Item Drop Rate against this enemy and the enemy cannot deal touch damage to you
  • Effects are halved for bosses

primary.name: Night Lord's Mark
primary.shortDesc: Leave a mark on attack at 60% chance. Attacking again will produce 3 Throwing Stars to deal 60% + 1% damage of player's level.
details: Increases activation chance, number of Throwing Stars created, and %Damage

primary.name: Sudden Raid
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 290, Damage: 494%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 7, Damage Over Time: 210% damage every 1 sec for 10 sec, Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Unleashes a devastating large attack that applies a damaging burning debuff
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Frailty Curse
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 41, lasts for 40 sec. Reduces Attack Power and Defense by 30% and Movement Speed by -60 for enemies, excluding Boss Monsters.\n[Passive Effect: Increases Damage When Attacking Bosses by 10%]
primary.desc: Creates a debuff zone that reduces enemy %Attack, %DEF, and Movement Speed
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Boss Damage
Does not reduce Movement Speed for bosses (unless you have Hyper Skill passive Frailty Curse - Boss Rush)

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Dark Harmony
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +40, Monster DEF Ignored: +30%

primary.name: Shadow Shifter
primary.shortDesc: Additional Avoidability Chance: 45%
primary.desc: Grants a chance to dodge attacks

primary.name: Toxic Venom
primary.shortDesc: Poison Chance: 50%, 160% damage every 1 sec for 8 sec, can be stacked 3 times
details: Increases debuff chance, duration, and %Damage
Can now be stacked (up to 3 times)

primary.name: Claw Expert
primary.shortDesc: Claw Mastery: +70%. Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +15%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

hyperPassive.name: Showdown - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: EXP Obtained and Item Drop Rate: +5%

hyperPassive.name: Frailty Curse - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Additional 10% Attack Power and Defense reduction.

hyperPassive.name: Frailty Curse - Boss Rush
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Frailty Curse is applied to bosses.

hyperActive.name: Bleed Dart
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Duration: 80 sec, Attack Power: +60.\nBleed Chance: 100%, Bleed Damage: 1000% damage every sec, Bleed Duration: 3 sec\nCooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: Grants flat Attack and causes your attacks to apply a deadly bleeding debuff

hyperActive.name: Death Star
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Damage: 358%, Number of Attacks: 7, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nCooldown: 14 sec
hyperActive.desc: Creates a giant shuriken that damages nearby enemies

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Explorer class in the party

fifthMain.name: Throwing Star Barrage
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 45 sec. Throwing skills gain extra spread
Lucky Seven attacks in 4 extra directions
Triple Throw attacks in 4 extra directions
Quad Star attacks in 3 extra directions, extra projectiles deal 20% less Final Damage
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Causes , , and to throw a spread of throwing stars in several directions
details: Does not apply to

fifthMain.name: Shurrikane
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 800, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 5
The huge shuriken flies forward striking foes, then spins in place dealing additional damage for 2 sec before disappearing. Using the skill again while the shuriken is flying will stop it immediately at its current location
40% of normal chance to trigger Assassin's Mark.
Cooldown: 25 sec
fifthMain.desc: Throws a giant shuriken forward that continuously spins in place before disappearing
details: Has a reduced chance to trigger
Pressing the Skill Key again while the shuriken is active will stop it immediately at its current location
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Dark Lord's Omen
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, shoot 5 Throwing Star(s) per 1 enemy for 12 sec, dealing 700% damage to max 7 enemies
7 additional Throwing Stars are launched regardless of the number of enemies.
Boss Damage: +30%
The scroll explodes when the skill duration ends, dealing 1800% damage with 10 additional attacks. Max Enemies Hit: 12
Cooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a giant orb that periodically launches out throwing stars
details: Attack has increased %Boss Damage
At the end of the Skill, the orb explodes dealing damage to nearby enemies
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Throw Blasting
fifthMain.shortDesc: Explosive Charm: explosion occurs around enemy hit by skill that throws shurikens up to 6 enemies with 950% damage 5 times\nPassive Effect: 1 explosive charm is prepared every 10 sec and activates. Active and Passive Effects cannot trigger simultaneously.\nActive Effect: MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 60 sec, Usable Explosive Charms: 68, uses min 2 and max 4 charms per attack skill, Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Throwing Star attacks gain Explosive Talismans that explode and damage nearby enemies
details: [Passive]: Prepares 1 Explosive Talisman for use every 10 seconds

When Active Effect is used, gain multiple Explosive Talismans for the duration of the buff
  • Each attack can consume a min. of 2 and max. of 4 Explosive Talismans
Passive and Active Effect cannot be active at the same time
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Night Lord is a LUK thief class part of the Explorers class group. Additionally, Night Lords consume Use Subi Throwing-Stars Throwing Stars as ammo
